ocean.question: I am big and blue and home to many creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats can sail on me.
🏖️ You can see me at the beach.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that Nemo is! What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I have orange and white stripes.
🐠 I live in anemones.
🎬 I am a famous movie character.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squirt ink.
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.
🖐️ I have many arms!

ocean.question: I am a very large sea creature with teeth. I’m not a whale. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🌊 I live in the ocean, and sometimes swim near surfers.
🦷 People are sometimes scared of my teeth.

ocean.question: I'm a slow-moving sea creature with a hard shell on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay eggs on the beach.
🥗 I might eat seaweed.
👵 My shell can be very old.

ocean.question: I'm a very large animal that sings songs underwater and breathes through a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🎶 I am known for my beautiful sounds.
🐋 I'm bigger than a car!

ocean.question: I am a sandy and rocky place where the ocean meets the land. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ People build sandcastles here.
☀️ You can find seashells on me.
🌊 I have water on one side and land on the other.

ocean.question: I am a strong underwater current that causes tides. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I am affected by the moon.
🌊 I make the water go up and down.
⬆️ When I come in, the beach gets smaller.

ocean.question: I am a tiny, glowing creature that lives in the deep ocean. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I make my own light.
🔬 You need a microscope to see me well.
🌌 I’m like a little star in the sea.

ocean.question: I am a group of tiny sea animals that build a big colorful home. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I make a home that looks like a rock, but isn't.
🐠 Many different fish live with me.
🧱 My home is fragile, don't touch!

plant.question: I am orange and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am long and crunchy!
🐇 I grow under the ground and rabbits love me!
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.

plant.question: I have a trunk, branches, and leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall and strong.
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am a flower that often has yellow petals and faces the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I look like a small sun.
🐝 Bees love to visit me.
☀️ I turn to face the sun throughout the day.

plant.question: I am red and juicy and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a salad or make sauce from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I'm a fruit that people often think is a vegetable.
🍝 You can put me on pasta.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I have a bumpy green skin and a sweet pink or red inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I'm very big and juicy.
🏖️ People often eat me in the summer at picnics.
🌱 I grow on a vine, close to the ground.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk and yellow kernels inside a husk. You can pop me into a tasty snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow on a farm.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
I can be ground into flour.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant with purple, red, or white flowers and I wrap around things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 Some kinds of me have a sweet smell!
🪴 I am often planted on fences or walls.
🧱 I need something to hold onto as I grow.

plant.question: I am a spiky green plant that grows in the desert and stores water inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am very good at living in hot, dry places.
🏜️ I can be tall or short.
💧 I hold a lot of water inside.

plant.question: I am a leafy green herb that smells strong and is used to flavor pizza and pasta sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 My leaves are often oval shaped.
🇮🇹 I am used a lot in Italian cooking.
🍕I taste great on pizza!

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a plant. I am found inside fruits like apples and oranges. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 A fruit usually has more than one of me inside!
🌱 From me, a new plant can grow.
🍊 Throwing me on the ground will help to grow more trees!
